title: Person of Interest | HOPE
author: kkeos
comment: This is amazing!! Good Job!! I hope that Root still ALIVE
This is amazing. I am about to cry

description: "The whole point of the Pandora's box is that once you've opened it, you can't close it again. But there's still one thing left in the Pandora's box; Hope"
